  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.isangeles.senlin.gui.tools.UserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, SaveElement
